ComicInfo.Summary: Don't miss the exciting relaunch of Zombies Vs. Cheerleaders! Always thrilling, pretty freaking funny, and never disappointing. Check out what all the commotion is about - macabre humor featuring, it can never be overstated, two things everyone loves: Zombies and Cheerleaders! Featuring a hot wraparound cover by Mike DeBalfo, the first issue contains an 8-page bonus story!
ComicInfo.Title: The Big Game!; Vote Zombie for Prom Queen; Punk Rock Girl; Friends and Family
ComicInfo.Writer: Gerrad McConnell,Heather Finley,Rich Koslowski,Steven L. Frank,Rich Koslowski,Heather Finley,Gerrad McConnell,Steven L. Frank
